name: 'The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time' 2 Quiz  | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who owns Lon Lon Ranch after the 7 years you are gone?
questions.explanation:
Ingo.

	You can race Ingo for Epona before he gives her to Ganondorf, but you need to know "Epona's Song".  You must beat him twice to win her.  He will then lock you into the ranch and you'll need to jump the fence with her.  You can call her anytime in the fields now.

Dampe.

	You must head to Kakariko Graveyard and race Dampe's ghost for the Hookshot.  He'll be under his grave in a maze if you need him.

Blue.

	Cojiro is a Blue Pocket Cucco used in the trading game to get the Biggoron Sword.  To get him, you trade the Pocket Cucco back to the Chicken Lady in Kakariko Village.

questions.text: What are the walking skeleton creatures you first meet in the Forest Temple?
questions.explanation:
Stalfos.

	Stalfos are fought in many places in this level and can sometimes revive, but most importantly, you fight them for the Fairy Bow.

Meg.

	Meg is the final poe sister.  This purple ghost splits into 4 different sisters and you need to hit the right one.  You can tell who she is when she spins.

questions.text: How many different notes must you play in the "Bolero of Fire?"
questions.explanation:
3.

	Down C, A, Down C, A, Right C, Down C, Right C, Down C, and you'll be transported to Death Mountain Crater.  You are taught the song by the one and only Sheik.

questions.text: How many Gorons do you find (excluding Darunia) in the Fire Temple?
questions.explanation:
8.

	8 Gorons are found in cages.  Each one is locked into the cage with a key which you'll use later in the temple.

questions.text: What does the Great Fairy of Wisdom give you as adult after the Fire Temple?
questions.explanation:
Doubled Magic.

	She gives you double the magic which is beneficial for your arrows, spells, and the Lens of Truth.  You blast a rock in Death Mountain Crater to find her.

Zora's Fountain.

	You need to go back to where Jabu-Jabu used to frolic and jump the icebergs to enter the Ice Cavern.

questions.text: Who gives you the Zora Tunic?
questions.explanation:
King Zora.

	You need to unthaw King Zora with some Blue Fire before you can sport the latest and final of the tunics.  This one lets you breath underwater, but only as an adult.
